meta.long_description: An extension to GTK+ that provides several useful widgets and classes to ease application development. Designed for elementary OS.
meta.name: granite

meta.description: An extension to GTK+ used by elementary OS

license.fullName: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 or later

meta.long_description:
Granite is a companion library for GTK+ and GLib. Among other things, it provides complex widgets and convenience functions
designed for use in apps built for elementary OS.
meta.name: granite
